name: Ask Alice Rubber Stamping Kit
description:
This clever little kit includes all the components necessary to make two colour stamped images. 

These components include a green ink pad, a navy blue ink pad, 3 oversized stamps (that come in two parts) and a set square ruler to help align your two colours and achieve a perfect printed image every time. 

The ink pads are made from non-toxic ink and the wood blocks from white maple that has been accredited by the Sustainable Forestry Initiative.

Stamps and Ink pads made in: The USA 
Ruler made in: Melbourne, Australia

Box Dimensions: 16.5cm wide, by 23cm tall and about 3cm thick

name: Hawthorn sewing pattern by Colette Patterns
description:
Turn heads in this curve-hugging classic that combines gamine styling with a flattering and feminine fit.

A semi-circle skirt provides volume without the extra bulk of pleats or gathers at your waist, so you get a clean, streamlined look that's still beautifully feminine. The bodice is fitted with waist darts, while still providing just enough room to keep things comfortable.

While a flat collar and fitted shape give Hawthorn that late 1950s charm, menswear-inspired details like the sleeve cuff and placket lend classic touches that never go out of style. You'll be wearing Hawthorn year round, easily styling it with belts, cardigans, and jewelry.

Version 1 is a short sleeved peplum blouse, which pairs perfectly with a pencil skirt or our slim Clover pants. Version 2 has 3/4 length sleeves with a cuff and menswear-style placket. Version 3 is sleeveless, with armholes finished with bias tape inside (so no annoying facings poking out).

description: I love hosting these workshops. It's always so satisfying to see kids learn a new skill and be really proud of what they have achieved. The classes I've designed over these school holidays cater to all ages and levels. All classes are held at 41 Main Road, Monbulk Call 03 9752 1114 for more details You can read the full description of the classes over on the blog. But here's a quick run down Tuesday 14th January, 2014 Beginner Crochet 10+ years 10.30am - 12.00pm All materials provided. $15.00 per child Beginner Knitting 8+ years 1.30pm - 3.00pm All materials provided. $15.00 per child Wednesday 15th January, 2014 Tween Sewing Class (8-11 years) - Bunting 10.30am - 12.30pm All materials are provided. A sewing machine will be required for this lesson. $35.00 per child Thursday 16th January, 2014 Teen Sewing Class (12+ years) - Essential Pamper Kit 10.30am - 1pm All materials included. $40.00 per person Friday 17th January & 24th January, 2014 Family Crafting Day - all ages 10.30am - 12pm $10 per child (no charge for parents/grandparents etc) Monday 20th January, 2014 Teen Beginners Plus Sewing Class - A-line Skirt 10.30am - 3.30pm Draft and sewing a simple A-Line skirt. No materials are included. A sewing machine will be required. $55.00 per person Tuesday 21st January, 2014 Teen Sewing Class - Laminated Zip Cosmetic Purse 10.30am - 12.30pm Includes all materials. A sewing machine will be required. $35.00 Wednesday 22nd January, 2014 Tween Sewing Class - No Zip Cushion Cover (includes insert) 10.30am - 12.30pm A sewing machine will be required. Includes all materials including a cushion insert. $40

name: The Crescent Blouse sewing pattern by Megan Nielsen
description:
This versatile design works equally well casually, as it does for more formal occasions. Features attractive cut outs over the shoulders, loose fit from below the bust, button closures at the neckline, and a cute collar. Pattern comes with two hem  variations - a cross over curved hem and tunic variation, as well as optional collar.

Your pattern envelope includes the full size pattern (covering sizes XS to XL) and the instruction booklet with detailed directions to help you construct this top. 

Check listing images for size chart & fabric requirements.
Image 5 also gives you inspiration for variation that you could apply to this pattern.

description:
After pouring all your blood, sweat and tears (or just tons of love) into a hand stitched or hand crafted project, add one of these Sublime Stitching woven labels.

name: Wonky Little House Pillow Pattern by Such Designs
description:
No matter your level of sewing expertise, express yourself and have fun with this quilted fabric collage pillow. Using simple techniques such as applique, crazy stitches and simple piecing, you'll make free-form houses, grass and whatever else you can dream up. Celebrate your inner artist with this playful pattern...the sky's the limit!

MATERIALS LIST

Gather your favorite cottons or linens (you’ll use them in funky ways to represent houses, sky, & grass.) You can raid your stash or buy new— try to have about 6 different fabrics (fat quarters) for the houses. Use smaller scraps for chimneys, doors, etc. You will need several shades of green (these strips need to be 6” x 30” long to span the length of the pillow.) Have any fabrics with bold bird prints or crazy flowers you’ve been saving? They make great appliqués. Maybe you want to use earth-tones or pastels? Go with your gut! 

Additionally, you will need:

• 1/2 yard of fabric for the sky background 
• 1/2 yard each of two bold prints to create the envelope pillow back (choose either quilting cotton or home dec weight.) 
• 1/2 yard of muslin to create the quilt sandwich 
• 1 yard of cotton batting 
• Your favorite green thread and assorted other colors 
• Tracing paper to trace pattern pieces 
• 16 x 20 pillow insert 

A pattern for the Wonky Little Houses Quilt is also available.

name: Billie Jean Sewing Pattern by Bluegingerdoll
description:
Billie Jean is a beautiful 1950s vintage inspired dress, with a touch of old Hollywood glamour. Featuring a fitted princess seam bodice, designed to enhance the waist, and an alluring and flattering neckline design.

A versatile and easily adaptable dress that is wearable in all seasons, day or night, and suits a variety of different fabrics. Perfect for you to experiment and add your own individual touch.

Unleash your inner vintage bombshell with a choice between 2 styles included in the pattern:

Dress 1 - A fully lined figure hugging wiggle dress, flattering all the right curves.

Dress 2- A fun full gathered skirt,with lined bodice and practical in seam pockets. 

Both close with lapped zipper at center back.

Your pattern envelope includes a full size paper pattern, clear, concise and easy to read instructions - all folded neatly into an envelope.

Imperial and Metric measurements are listed on this multisize pattern, sizes: 4 -18. Please refer to back of pattern

Fabric requirements - Please refer to back of pattern

name: Laminate your fabric with this flexible vinyl
description: Heat n Bond Flexible Vinyl Protect & laminate any of your favourite fabrics. It's easy to iron on and can be used for a number of different projects - both sew or no-sew. This listing is for one roll 17' x 2 Yds or 43cm x 1.828m It has a gloss finish and is easy to wipe down. It is recommended that the finished item be hand washed or wiped down after use. Visit this post on The Haby Goddess blog showing you how to use this product. Laminating your Fabric The manufacturer offers this infomation: Due to the recent Consumer Product Safety Act of 2009 regarding the exposure of children to plastics, Therm O Web tested our Iron-On Vinyl product for full compatibility with new government regulations. Our testing found that Iron-On Vinyl contains no BPA or lead content. However, Iron-On Vinyl does utilize a plasticizer, DIDP, and even though this Phthalate is not banned by the government, as a precaution we would suggest that Iron-On Vinyl not be used on items that are meant to be chewed on or sucked on by children.

name: The Seam Allowance Guide save loads of time!
description:
If you love Japanese pattern books, creating your own patterns or copying patterns from clothes you already own but hate adding the seam allowance in, then this little gadget is what you need!

No longer do you have to measure and trace around each individual piece, the Seam Allowance Guide will do that for you while you cut out your fabric.

Australian owned & designed by Hollie, this pack comes with 2 tools.

Some scissors blades have a slight slope on the outer edge. This is about 3 degrees. If your scissor blade is sloping put the yellow guide on and rotate it until it's parallel to the table/fabric. The green guide is used for scissors that have no slope on the outer edge of the blade. Also great for the tip or at the pivot of the scissors.

The Seam Allowance Guide uses a rare earth magnet which is extremely strong.

name: The Bias Binding Guide - a digital handbook
description: Creating and applying bias tape/binding are sewing techniques that once you learn how to do correctly, you will never look back. You'll wonder why you had been putting them off all these years! I've put together this handy guide of all related content from The Haby Goddess Blog, , Sew School Online plus new original material. It's a collection of step by step instructions with clear detailed images plus a few extra bonus video's thrown in also. Here's what the guide contains: Finding your grain Difference between single & double bias Handy Tools How much fabric will I need? What types of fabric to use? Cutting your fabric strips Making your bias Joining your bias strips Using a bias tape maker Sewing on your bias binding – Technique 1 (includes video) Sewing on your bias binding – Technique 2 Add bias to curves How to achieve a neat corner? Finishing off bias binding (video) Additional techniques – Add bias to an inside edge Bias binding gadgets – Using a binding foot attachment Bias binding gadgets – Simplicity Bias Tape Maker File size is 2.3mb and it will be automatically sent to your paypal address after purchase. Written & photographed by Jodie Maloni of The Haby Goddess and Sew School Online.

name: Make it Perfect pattern book by Toni Coward
description:
This 133 page hardcover book provides you with 21 fabulous sewing patterns for sewing women's & children's clothes.

There are gorgeous garments for women (multi-sized), and cute outfits for children aged 6 months to 5 years. 

All of the patterns have straightforward instructions, clear step-by-step illustrations and full-size pattern sheets with a pocket in the back for easy storage. 

Simply choose a project and select your favourite new or vintage fabric to create a unique look.

See image 3 for a pinnie I made from the book and image 4 for the chill out slippers.

name: E-book: The Craft of Markets - How to achieve market stall success, An Australian perspective
description:
So you’ve decided that maybe you’d like to run your own craft market stall…lots of fun, but lots of hard work as well.

This e-book will help you make better choices about what market strategy is right for you. Whether you are just wanting to earn a few extra dollars or use markets as a stepping stone into something much bigger.

Learn all the tips and tricks to having a successful and profitable market stall with a minimum amount of stress and a maximum amount of fun!

Full of practical, honest advice and some important questions every prospective stall holder needs to ask themselves before they commit to the world of markets.

Includes sections on Picking the right market for you, Market applications, Products, Pricing, Merchandising Logistics and more. Also contains a handy printable Essentials checklist and a Resources guide with links to packaging and display item stockists and more…

Written by Cintia Gonzalez of My Poppet and Jodie Maloni from The Haby Goddess, who between them have over 10 years of market experience, and many more in both bricks & mortar and online retail. With some extra handy hints from some market organisers.

name: A quick & easy Vintage Fabric Bunting kit
description: If you can sew in a straight line, you can make this bunting. This kit contains all the materials you need to make 3 m of bunting with easy to follow instructions. Pre-cut flags means you just need to sew them together! "To a novice who is learning the craft of sewing I was so happy with the beautiful result and how much confidence a simple kit can create. The instrustions were easy to follow and the fabric was so cute. Thanks for a great product! Michelle" Kit contains: 3m bias binding, 24 pre-cut fabric pieces (makes 12 flags), My Poppet label and instructions. You need: sewing machine, thread, iron, scissors. Fabrics may differ from those pictured but will most definitely be pretty vintage florals in assorted colours and patterns. Fabric is genuine vintage

description:
With the demand of Japanese pattern books increasing world over, this popular book has now been translated into English.

Stylish Dress Book:Wear with Freedom by Yoshiko Tsukiori  contains 26 sewing projects for beautiful dresses and blouses. Elegant and loose-fitting, the pieces in this book are designed to be worn in any season and are suitable for women of all ages. The easy-to-follow instructions are accompanied by detailed diagrams and gorgeous full-colour photographs. The full-sized pattern sheets have been adapted for Western sizing and run from AU 6–16.

name: Kids Loopy Scarf Kit
description:
This kit comes with everything you need to learn to knit this Loopy Scarf in lovely Australian wool. Designed by Australian Knit Knit.

Kit includes:

fully illustrated instructions to teach you to knit
1 ball of 100% Australian wool yarn
bamboo knitting needles
blunt wool needle
KnitKnit sticker sheet
 

This kit is designed especially for little hands and is the perfect way to learn to knit. The instructions are full of pictures and are very simple and easy to follow, so there is no need for the parent or carer to know how to knit. You can learn at the same time as your child. 

This scarf is a circle scarf designed to fit a child aged around 7-12.

This kit is recommended for kids aged 7 and up.

name: Kids Classic Scarf Kit
description:
This kit comes with everything you need to learn to knit this Classic Scarf in lovely Australian wool. Designed by Australian Knit Knit.

Kit includes:

fully illustrated instructions to teach you to knit
2 balls of 100% Australian wool yarn
bamboo knitting needles
KnitKnit sticker sheet
 

This kit is designed especially for little hands and is the perfect way to learn to knit. The instructions are full of pictures and are very simple and easy to follow, so there is no need for the parents or carer to know how to knit. You can learn at the same time as your child. 

This scarf is a straight scarf designed to fit a child aged around 7-15.

This kit is recommended for kids aged 7 and up.

name: Dream Homes - Embroidery Pattern by Sublime Stitching
description:
What is your dream home? A cozy cottage or an atomic ranch? An urban brownstone or desert adobe? Sigh. It's so hard to choose. Here, you can have them all! In any colors you wish...

Just iron on to fabric and then stitch along the lines! 

The transfers will imprint multiple times so you can repeat a pattern for more than one use. (How dark you make each imprint will determine how many repeats you get.) 

Each sheet of designs measures 8 ½” x 11” with multiple patterns on high-quality paper for re-use. These patterns can also be imprinted onto wood and card stock for other crafts. 

Every pack comes with complete instructions for use and an introductory stitch lesson.

name: Innergreen Eco-friendly toy fill - Corn Fiber
description:
Innergreen, is an Australian company that has researched, developed and produced a sustainable fibrous filling that is made from 100% Natural Corn. 

It is silky soft, non-allergenic, has a very low flamimability, resiliant and because it's a fibre made from corn it's 100% biodegradable. 

This product is extremely well priced for it's quality and comes in two sizes.

250g or 500g bags

Your crafting supplies will be organised in no time.

name: Mixtape Fabric by Curly Pops
description:
I remember creating my own Mixtape from the radio.  The aim to to miss the radio stations intro and cut it off just at the right moment!

Curly Pops has created this quirky fun fabric as part of her Bright Lights Collection.

This is an original hand drawn illustration which has been printed on a Kona Quilting Weight 100% cotton basecloth.

It's perfect for any application from quilting and applique, to summer skirts and dresses.

This listing is for a panel – 53cm x 45cm (21 in x 17.5 in) - see image 3

Fabric is also available by the metre if you would prefer that option (just purchase multiple units as follows):

1 unit = 107cm wide print x 22.5cm long length 
2 units = 107cm wide print x 45cm long length 
3 units = 107cm wide print x 67.5cm long length 
4 units = 107cm wide print x 90cm long length

Fabric has been digitally printed - Machine wash warm or cool using phosphate-free detergent. Estimated shrinkage is 2%.

*Note: the colour on screen is as close to actual as I can provide. All screen colours differ, so please keep this in mind when ordering.

**Natural textiles are prone to imperfections, such as tiny knots, called slubs and neps, in the cotton’s woven structure, generated during the weaving process. Some knots may become dislodged in the washing process thereby affecting the printing result as a little white spot where the knot is might lift. Even extensive checking of the fabric won’t avoid weaving anomolies. They are a part of the charm of a natural textile product

name: Go Granny Fabric by Curly Pops
description:
This Go Granny fabric is designed and printed right here in Melbourne. The design emerged from Curly Pops hand drawn original illustration.

Fabric is printed on a 135gsm 100% natural fibre cotton basecloth using water based, non-toxic solvent free inks.

It's perfect for any application from quilting and applique, to summer skirts and dresses.

This listing is for a panel – 70cm x 50cm (27 in x 18 in)

Each single granny square measures 4.5cm x 4.5cm (1.8 in x 1.8 in).

Fabric is also available by the metre if you would prefer that option (just purchase multiple units as follows):

1 unit = 140cm wide print x 25cm long length 
2 units = 140cm wide print x 50cm long length 
3 units = 140cm wide print x 75cm long length 
4 units = 140cm wide print x 100cm long length

Care instructions: Machine wash warm or cool using phosphate-free detergent

All screen colours differ, so please keep this in mind when ordering.

Note from the designer: Natural textiles are prone to imperfections, such as tiny knots, called slubs and neps, in the cotton’s woven structure, generated during the weaving process. Some knots may become dislodged in the washing process thereby affecting the printing result as a little white spot where the knot is might lift. Even extensive checking of the fabric won’t avoid weaving anomolies. They are a part of the charm of a natural textile product.

name: Frilly Scarf Kit by Knit Knit
description:
This beautiful frilly scarf is perfect for cool Summer or Autumn evenings. The cotton yarn is cool and breezy, and would make a wonderful gift.

KnitKnit knitting kits are designed especially for beginners, and this kit is perfect for total newbies. The instructions are full of pictures and are very simple and easy to follow, making it perfect for even first time knitters. They assume you know nothing at all about knitting, and teach you to create this beautiful scarf.

The Complete Frilly Scarf Kit includes everything you need to create a unique frilly scarf: 

* beautiful 80% cotton, 20% wool yarn 
* 1 pair bamboo knitting needles 
* easy-to-follow illustrated frilly scarf instructions 
* a KnitKnit printed calico bag to carry your project around in 
* and a wool needle

Price: $35 (includes free shipping anywhere in Australia)

name: Make it - Mini Cross Stitch Kits
description:
Who says size matters?

Measuring only 10cm 10cm when completed, this Make It Cross Stitch Kit is the perfect little project for beginners or the younger crafters.

Perfectly priced for a small gift also.

Included in kit: 
DMC Stranded cotton 
Cross Stitch Chart 
DMC 14 Count Aida 
Size 24 Needle 
Full stitching instructions

Eight great designs to choose from.

name: The must have Colette Sewing Handbook
description:
You LOVE the patterns so now you will LOVE this new book by Colette Patterns.

This book is a must to have in your collection.

Includes five beautiful patterns for modern classic pieces, including a scalloped-hem skirt, flutter-sleeve blouse, sweetheart neck sheath dress, asymmetrical flounce dress, and a lined dress with gathered sleeves. 

Each project will help you put basic fundamentals into practice as you sew.

Instead of a big, confusing catalog of sewing techniques, you'll build your knowledge gradually around five simple fundamentals. A section of basic sewing lessons means you'll never feel lost.

As this book is over 1 Kg in weight, unfortunately I've made the  decision  to only post within Australia.  It is just way too hard to accurately calculate each country.  If you would like a quote on postage to an international destination, plus email me at jodie@thehabygoddess.com.au

name: English Translation: Girls Style Book : 24 Sewing Patterns
description:
Japanese craft books are loved the world over for their beautiful and practical design, unique aesthetic, and their clear, meticulous and educational instruction. 

Translated into English for the first time, Girls Style Book contains 24 projects for gorgeous dresses, blouses, outfits and accessories for girls aged 4–10.  

The easy-to-follow instructions are accompanied by detailed diagrams, gorgeous full-colour photographs and full-sized pattern sheets.

name: Split Personality Reversible Bag Sewing Pattern
description:
~ All single sewing patterns ship free within Australia ~

Straight Stitch Society Patterns have created a sewing pattern that caters for both sides of our personality : a wild and crazy side and a quiet, thoughtful side.

Make both sides happy with this supercute reversible slouch bag. Use an unexpected combination of colors and prints on one side for a bold look and a subtle mix of fabrics on the other side for a more sedate look. Simply flip the bag inside out when you want to change the side of your personality that's on display.

Finished Measurements
17" w x 10 1/4" h (with handles 20 1/2") x 4 1/4" d

44/45"-wide light- to medium-weight woven fabrics, such as quilting cotton, broadcloth, poplin, chambray, and linen:

1/2 yd fabric A (side 1 top and strap)
1/2 yd fabric B (side 1 bottom, base, button flap, and buttonhole tab)
1/2 yd fabric C (side 2 top and strap)
1/2 yd fabric D (side 2 bottom and base)
12" x 10" piece for fabric E (side 2 button flap and buttonhole tab)
1 1/2 yds of 20"-wide extra firm sew-in or fusible interfacing

Coordinating thread

Two 1" buttons

description:
Make your own Roxy Longsocks with this fun pattern kit. The kit contains a sewing pattern and instructions and a face panel printed on linen/cotton blend fabric. 

<b>You get to choose your own fabrics for your Roxy Longsocks - they aren’t included in the pattern kit - that’s part of the fun!<b>

Roxy is sure to be a hit with the kids with her sweet face and long dangly legs. Make Springtime Roxy Longsocks, or the Wintertime version with her scarf, coat, hoodie and mittens.

The pattern kit comes with the face panel of your choice. Additional printed face panels are also available for purchase. 

There are faces with blue, brown green and dark asian eyes. Roxy's hair is appliquéd on with your own fabric - so you choose what colour it will be.

There is also a pattern included to make appliqued felt and fabric faces.

Finished Roxy Longsocks dolls are about 66 cm tall. That’s 25.5 inches.

**For personal use only. Products created using this pattern may not be resold.

name: Ooshka Boy pattern kit from The Red Thread
description:
Make your own superhero with this Ooshka Boy pattern kit. The Red Thread kit contains a sewing pattern and instructions and a face panel printed on linen/cotton blend fabric.

You get to choose your own fabrics for your Ooshka Boys - they aren’t included in the pattern kit - that’s part of the fun!

The pattern kit comes with one fabric face panel. 

Finished Ooshka Boys are about 41 cm tall. That’s 16 inches.

**For personal use only. Products created using this pattern may not be resold.

name: Makedo Guided Kits - Flowers
description:
Turn paper cups, plastic bottles, lids and other household packaging into your own beautiful bouquet.

Introduce children to the idea of using found materials as the building blocks for their creativity – see them create and decorate a vase full of Flowers with Makedo.

Find & Make Flowers includes Makedo’s plastic Safe-saw for punching holes and cutting cardboard safely, Re-clips and Lock-hinges to connect materials together quickly and easily, stickers for decorating, and easy to follow instructions.

You will just need to find a few small to medium containers, lids, cups or bottles to get creating.

All Makedo parts are reusable so as the seasons go by, pull apart your bunch of Flowers to build another.

Build time: approx. 1 hr.
Age: 5+ (kids under 7 may need a little help from a grown-up)

name: Reynolds Freezer Paper - Roll (13.3 yd or 12.1 m)
description:
Reynolds Freezer Paper is plastic coated on one side.

It comes in a roll of 13 1/3 yards x 15 inches wide or 12.1 m x 381mm wide.

There are so many uses for this product but it mostly used for making stencils & appliques. (and yes wrapping things in the freezer too!)

It can temporarily adhere to fabric with a hot iron & will peel off when stencil paint is dry.

name: Do you need something to stop those fraying edges?
description: Fray Stoppa will help eliminate the problem with edges & seams fraying. Drys in around 5 minutes and is flexible. 50ml (US 1.70 fl.oz) This product is made in Australian and is owned by an Australian company Helmar - YAY to that I say! Visit this post on The Haby Goddess blog showing you my review of this product

name: Metal Internal Flex Frames in Silver in two sizes
description:
Want to make sunglass or mobile phone pouches with a flexible opening?
You will need these metal internal flex frames.

Available in two sizes - 8.5 cm or 10cm long, they are 1.4cm in width.

These listings are for:

1 pack of 10 x 8.5 cm metal frames
or 1 pack of 8 x 10 cm metal frames

name: Eyelet Pliers with 100 eyelets included.
description:
Use these pliers with eyelets on fabric, paper, vinyl or a combo of these.

There are two different sizes available and each come with 100 eyelets.  

The smaller size includes four colours of eyelets : copper, gold, silver & black.  Each eyelet is approx 7mm in diameter

The larger eyelets are gold only. Each eyelet is approx 13mm in diameter

name: Uppercase Magazine - Issue 18
description:
A magazine for the creative and curious.

This stunning issue has a lot about collage

Drawing and furniture by Thomas Wold.
Feature on Dutch designer Piet Hein Eek
A profile on French designer and illustrator Mathilde Aubier

name: 'tickle the imagination' Celebrations Print Issue
description:
We all have to play host to life's celebrations from time to time.
This issue of 'tickle' will give you the inspiration needed with their gorgeous photoshoots, articles and creative projects.

After another successful Pozible campaign, the gorgeous 'tickle the imagination' Celebrations issue has been gone to print.

Filled with gorgeous inspiration from Australian designers and makers, this will make a beautiful coffee table book and keepsake. This gorgeous little magazine is A4 in size and printed in Perth on gorgeous FSC approved recycled paper.

In this issue:
- Vintage baby shower
- Finishing details for making your celebration a success and handmade touches
- Baking for that special occasion 
- Create a cute & fun pom pom garland
- Photoshoots giving you ideas and inspiration of many different celebrations.

name: Pom Pom Quarterly.
description:
This ultra gorgeous mag is a UK quarterly knitting publication.

This is the 1st Anniversary Camp Issue.

Includes patterns for socks, a shawl, cardi, cape, scarf and pull over.

name: Homemaker Magazine Issue 10
description:
Homemaker Magazine is one with the lot.
Making, Interiors, Stitching, Baking, Knitting & More.

In this issue:

Receive your free gift of a cute Woodlands Notebook.

Make:
revamp a vintage chair
go monochrome in paint
stitch a laundry tote
macaroons in six steps
try embroidery

name: The Simple Things - Issue 9
description:
This great magazine from the producers of Mollie Makes, takes a look at the simpler side of life.

Backyard gardening
Stylish storage
Indulgent breakfasts
Vintage buys and
Take a tour around the city of Paris

name: The Simple Things - Issue 7
description:
The Simple Things allows us to slow down and enjoy the things we love.

Rummaging through op shops, cooking & sharing simple food with family & friends, growing your own vegetables, visiting & supporting local producers at markets, making a cosy home, enjoying traditional gifts and much more…

Here are just a few of the highlights:

Mother's Day lunch - treat her to posh eggs and a sticky bun
Afternoon walks - routes, gear & the perfect pocket picnic
Plant & pick sweet peas - your guide to getting the scent of summer
Living well in small spaces - creating airy rooms Swedish style
Transform your home with market finds

name: The Simple Things Magazine - Issue 6
description:
The Simple Things allows us to slow down and enjoy the things we love.

Rummaging through op shops, cooking & sharing simple food with family & friends, growing your own vegetables, visiting & supporting local producers at markets, making a cosy home, enjoying traditional gifts and much more…

Here are just a few of the highlights:

- Make every breakfast a feast by whizzing up your own nut butter.
- The pleasures and treasures of Winter beside the seaside.
Chilli love! Growing your own is easy, tasty and super colourful.
- Why not bake some Nordic bread, throw a food swap party or learn blacksmithery? Heaps of “Things to Plan and Do” await!
- Enter the aroma-filled kitchen of Leon co-conspirator Kay Plunkett-Hogge.
- Feel the promise of Spring with gardener Ark Redwood.
- How books can make a home – decoration ideas for your much-loved tomes.
- Explore the welcoming heart of vibrant Melbourne in the company of a local.
- Lunch With Friends at New York’s Fat Radish café, including a selection of mouth-watering recipes.
- The lost shops of Britain – the evocative photos of John Londei.
- Mid-Winter in the garden – who’s eaten everything?
- Kaffee und Kuchen – a delicious German tradition.
- 21st Century fish expert Mitch Tonks explains why we should enjoy more shellfish.
- Creating a relaxed mix-and-match home with interiors guru Debi Treloar.
- Awww! This Issue’s collector shares her amazing stash of Valentine cards.
- Jeremy Seal on why Britain’s wildlife is awe-inspiring.
- A delicious Valentine dinner for two – seriously romantic (but not slushy or showy).

name: Extra Curricular - Issue 9 - 1/2 price!
description:
Extra Curricular is an independently published journal about folks who get creative with their spare time.

The music issue is guest-edited by Sonya Nagels and features some exceptional musicians as well as recipes and a tutorial in keeping with the musical theme. Having written and photographed for Extra Curricular since the very beginning, Sonya has just returned to New Zealand after living in Amsterdam and Melbourne for the past 8 years and is bringing her unique creative talents and love of music together for this special issue.

Issue 9 includes interviews with musicians Tiny Ruins, Karla Way from Beaches, Eammon from Ghostwave, and Disasteradio among others. Illustrator Rebecca ter Borg created the little drummer boy for our cover, Rachel Rayner talks to record enthusiasts and Martha Goes Green shake it up with some rock 'n' roll cocktails.

Extra Curricular is printed in full colour with vegetable based inks on 100% recycled stock. 
76 pages 
200mm x 148mm

Made in New Zealand.

name: Make your own Bias Tape - 12mm, 18mm & 25mm
description:
Now you can make you own binding in matching or contrasting fabric. 

This Clover Bias Maker will make 12mm, 18mm or 25mm wide bias. 
Check images 3, 4 & 5 to see how easy it is.
If you have any further questions in relation to making bias just sing out : jodie@thehabygoddess.com.au

I'm converted - I now make all of my own bias!

name: Kanzashi Flower Maker - pointed petals  (small & large)
description:
This handy plate by Clover creates Kanzashi flowers quickly & easily.

Size Small will create round petal edges and create a flower with a finished size of 50mm or 2 inches (the image shown is made from the small template). 

Size Large will create round petal edges and create a flower with a finished size of 75mm or 3 inches (the image shown is made from the small template).

All you need is fabric, scissors, thread & a needle.

name: Adding snap fasteners are easy with these pliers
description:
This Birch brand Gripper set comes with a pair of pliers plus 8 sets of fasteners.

They are super easy to use and make a great alternative to buttons.

name: Bias Binding - 20mm
description:
I have this high quality 20mm polycotton bias binding custom made. It is an item that I use daily and highly recommend.

A 20mm width is hard to find and it comes in a great range of colours.
Buy a small length or bulk quantity.  It's the one great price.

name: Wonky Little House Quilt Pattern by Such Designs
description:
Express yourself and have fun creating a charming village of wonky little houses. Gather your favorite cottons or linens. You'll use them in funky ways to represent houses, sky, & grass. 

Do you have any bold bird prints or crazy flowers you've been saving? They make great appliques. 

Celebrate your inner artist with this playful pattern...the sky's the limit!

Patterns gives instructions for quilt sizes Baby through to King.

MATERIALS LIST 
(see yardage requirements included with photos)

A pattern is also available for Wonky Little Houses Pillow pattern.  It is not included in this pattern.

name: Have It All Wallet pattern by Straight Stitch Society
description:
Who says you can't have it all? 
With this sleek, versatile wallet you can take everything with you while keeping it all neat and organized. 

Featuring pockets for credit cards, business cards and a zippered pocket for coins and other loose items, this wallet lets you organize that mess of stuff in your handbag and snap it neatly closed with either of two cute flaps.

What You'll Need
44/45"-wide quilting cotton, linen, or other lightweight woven fabrics:

1/2 yd or 1 fat quarter fabric A (outside of wallet)
1/2 yd fabric B (interior pockets)
5" x 5" scrap fabric C (bow, View 1)
1/2 yd of 20"-wide lightweight, non-woven fusible interfacing
7" x 13" extra firm woven sew-in interfacing

One coordinating regular (coil) zipper 7" long or longer

Coordinating thread

One sew-in or set-in snap (approximately 7/16" diameter — size 3 sew-in or size 16 set-in)

Errata
The first printing of this pattern contained a minor error in Step 1. The first bullet point should call for two strips of interfacing 1" wide x 6 3/4" long (not 6 1/2" long).

All sewing pattern ship free within Australia

All designs have instructions for a simple lapped over back making them perfect for beginner sewers or those looking for quick designs for instant re-decorating.

A Lynne Wilson Design

1 Unit is 1 metre

Coloured twill is also available under 'Trims' heading

name: Book - Crochet with Zpagetti
description: This full colour 64-page book by Gesse Mosies, introduces you to the art of crocheting with Hoooked Zpagetti. The book covers a great selection of projects for knitting and crochet with the simplest of stitches used. I LOVE the homewares section which includes a very cool ottoman and vase covers such as the one I made in this blog post where I used a preserving jar I picked up at the op shop! The book also includes patterns for a number of bags, pillows and accessories. A front section also covers crochet stitches and basic techniques It includes full project instructions for 14 projects, to make your own your own stylish crocheted handbags, lounge cushions, ottomans and more.

name: Knitters Tips & Tricks Class - Saturday 29th March, 2014
description:
Knitters Tips & Tricks Class
Saturday 29th March, 2014
12pm - 2pm

If you know the basics but would like to take your knitting to the next class, then this class will be perfect.

A hand on workshop where you will:
- finish off and sew up your seams

- show you many knitted samples & with a variety techniques

description:
Stop letting your sewing machine collect dust! 
Bring it along to these lessons and learn how to use it.

These lessons start from the start. From conquering basic stitching & fundamentals to doing buttonholes, zips & more.

In week 4 we will also get started on a project of your choice.

$95.00 for the 4 lessons. Choose from either:

Thursday's 13th February, 2014 to 6th March, 2014
or Saturday's 8th February, 2014 to 1st March, 2014

10.00am to 12pm

Held at 41 Main Road, Monbulk
Call (03) 9752 1114 for more details.

description:
Beginner Crochet - 6 weeks 
Tuesday 11th February 2014 to 18th March 2014
10.00am to 12pm

Resident Crochet Guru Kirsten Yarra will be teaching all the basic techniques including how to make granny squares, crocheting in a round and doing simple embellishments.  You will also have the opportunity in the last few weeks to make a start on a project of your choice under the guidance of Kirsten.

No materials are included but all are available for purchase from The Haby Goddess.

$120.00 per person for the 6 weeks

description:
Saturday 29th March, 2014
10am-12pm
An experienced knitter will show you:

- basics of plain & purl
- achieving neat edges

All materials to practise with are included in $20 workshop price.

name: Zpagetti Yarn Basket Workshops
description:
Zpagetti yarn is so much fun to work with and your basket is made before you know it!

This 2 hour workshop is only $55 and includes all you need to make a series of small baskets.

1 x large cone of Zpagetti yarn (your choice of colour)

You will only need an idea of how to chain, slip & single crochet. But we will run through them again at the beginning of the lesson.

Check out image 3 for some of the great baskets made at a workshop!
Thursday 19th February, 2014 7.00pm to 9.30pm
Monday 3rd March, 2014 10.00am to 12.30pm

Workshops held at : 41 Main Road, Monbulk Vic
Call (03) 9752 1114 for more details.

name: Sew School Online - 6 Week Course starts Monday 10th February, 2014
description: The next round of Sew School Online starts Monday 10th February, 2014 So if you've been putting off learning to sew, don't! Sew School Online is a 6 week beginners sewing course consisting of over 30 lessons with text, images to follow and some videos. Courses are offered each school term and give access to the tutorials for a further 14 days after the course has finished. The tutorials are run by The Haby Goddess’s Jodie Maloni. Jodie has had many years sewing experience. Throughout each course you have the opportunity to ask as many questions as you like regarding the lessons via the comments section after each lesson or the facebook page. Jodie will be active on both for the entire course to answer your questions. ​ You can also interact and chat with the other online students through out and after the course. The courses offer pdf projects that you can print out and keep. You do not have to do these projects during the course. Bonuses for Sew Schoolers: The Bias Binding Guide e-book by The Haby Goddess Bunting & Garland e-book by My Poppet Don't miss out, enrol now! This course is available internationally too! Detailed descriptions of all lessons can be found at the Sew School Online website ~ www.sewschool.com.au

name: Magnetic Stud Closure set - 19mm or 25mm (1 Pack)

name: Clarke loves Edna Fabric by Curly Pops
description:
Bring some retro coolness into your sewing with this awesome fabric by Curly Pops.

Fabric is digitally printed on a Kona Quilting Weight 100% cotton basecloth.

It's perfect for any application from quilting and applique, to summer skirts and dresses.

This listing is for a panel – 53cm x 50cm (21 in x 19.5 in) see image 3

Fabric is also available by the metre if you would prefer that option (just purchase multiple units as follows):

1 unit = 107cm wide print x 25cm long length 
2 units = 107cm wide print x 50cm long length 
3 units = 107cm wide print x 75cm long length 
4 units = 107cm wide print x 100cm long length

Care instructions: Machine wash warm or cool using phosphate-free detergent. Estimated shrinkage is 2%.

All screen colours differ, so please keep this in mind when ordering.

Note from the designer: Natural textiles are prone to imperfections, such as tiny knots, called slubs and neps, in the cotton’s woven structure, generated during the weaving process. Some knots may become dislodged in the washing process thereby affecting the printing result as a little white spot where the knot is might lift. Even extensive checking of the fabric won’t avoid weaving anomolies. They are a part of the charm of a natural textile product.

name: Linear Tangerine Fabric by Curly Pops

Note from the designer: Natural textiles are prone to imperfections, such as tiny knots, called slubs and neps, in the cotton’s woven structure, generated during the weaving process. Some knots may become dislodged in the washing process thereby affecting the printing result as a little white spot where the knot is might lift. Even extensive checking of the fabric won’t avoid weaving anomolies. They are a part of the charm of a natural textile product

description:
This is a nifty sewing accessory that will help create bag & tote straps.

It is an interfacing that is already cut to width.  You iron in on to your strip of fabric.  Fold along the perforated lines, cover with your co-ordinating ribon or fabric backing then stitch. 

See these two Haby Goddess tutorials using this awesome product:
http://thehabygoddess.blogspot.com/2011/05/how-to-use-create-strap.html

http://thehabygoddess.blogspot.com/2011/05/best-ways-to-cover-plastic-headband.html

1" or 25m wide and the pack includes 2m or (2.2 yards) of length. 
5/8" or 15mm x 2m (2.2 yards) of length

description:

Rounded edges.

6" or  15cm

name: Lanie Sewing Pattern by Valori Wells
description:
Part of the Girlfriends series by Valori Wells & Nick Coman, this figure flattering wrap dress is perfect for most figure types.

It was designed for use with woven fabrics: cotton, linen, rayon, cotton voile, etc.
It is simple enough to make in a day.
A multi sized pattern from small to x-large.

Fabric requirements:
45" (115cm)
Sml - Med 2.6m
Lge - Xlge 2.9m

60" (150cm)
Sml - Med 2.3m
Lge - Xlge 2.5m

name: Chantilly by Colette Patterns
description:
This fully lined dress is designed to be made in a soft fabric. A neckline yoke and flattering curved midriff provide shape, while gathers at the bust and six gore skirt give soft fullness. Closes with an invisible side zipper.

Size 0-18
Immediate level of skilled required

name: 'Hazel' - Dress pattern by Colette Patterns
description:
~ All single sewing patterns ship free within Australia ~

Team this cute dress with a little cardigan or jacket for the cooler months. 

This quick and easy dress combines a flattering V-seamed bodice with side panels cut on the bias, letting you play with patterns such as stripes and plaids. The simple dirndl style skirt has in-seam pockets. Version 2 gives cutting layouts for using border print fabrics.

Multi sized from 0 to 18

name: Juniper pant sewing pattern by Colette Patterns
description:
~ All single sewing patterns ship free within Australia ~

Classic wide-leg trousers perfectly fitted through the hips and falling gently to a moderately wide hem. This pattern will guide you through sewing slash pockets and a fly front. 

With a simple construction and flattering shape, you can practice new skills while creating a wardrobe staple.

Skill level : beginner
Sizes : 0 - 18 (US)

name: 'Iris' - Shorts pattern by Colette Patterns
description:
~ All single sewing patterns ship free within Australia ~

These simple and cute shorts are so quick to sew, you could make them in every color. 

Pockets are set into a front side seam and optionally close with buttons. The shorts sport a 4 1/2 inch inseam length and close with an invisible side zipper.

Designed for the beginner sewer.

This pattern is multi sized from 0 to 18

name: Jasmine sewing pattern by Colette Patterns
description:
~ All single sewing patterns ship free within Australia ~

Lovely figure-skimming top with no closures, due to the flattering bias cut. This blouse is shaped with bust darts and center seams that gently hug the body. Version 1 has a long collar that can be tied in a bow and elbow length sleeves gathered to a cuff. Version 2 has a shorter contrast collar and a notched cuff.

Skill Level Beginner
Sizes: Multi-sized from 0 to 18

name: 'Lily' - Sundress pattern by Colette Patterns
description:
~ All single sewing patterns ship free within Australia ~

Princess seam sundress with a curve skimming fit. team it with a cute cardi for the cooler months.

The neckline and pockets are adorned with a flap detail that can be made in self fabric (version 1) or contrasting fabric (version 2). 

The skirt is slightly tapered for a slim fit, and includes a back kickpleat for ease of movement. The back closes with an invisible zipper.

It is for the intermediate sewer.
Multi-sized from 0 to 18

name: 'Ginger' sewing pattern by Colette Patterns
description:
~ All single sewing patterns ship free within Australia ~

Colette Patterns are high quality, independent pattern makers.  They produce full size, paper sewing patterns in gorgeous packaging and include a detailed instruction booklet.

New to their range is Ginger. A simple and pretty a-line skirt with high waistband. Version 1 has a pointed center waist, version 2 has a shaped curved band. Version 3 has a straight waistband, with skirt cut on the bias.

Skill Level: Beginner
Sizes: Multi-sized from 0 to 18

View size chart & patetrn details - images 4 & 5

Expected to arrive by end of month.  Don't miss out on being first in with this initial order.  They will go fast.

name: A sweet button blouse pattern called Violet
description:
The first delivery of the new pattern by Colette patterns sold out before it had arrived. New stock is now in store

This button-front blouse has a gentle loose fit reminiscent of the 1960s, and looks equally adorable tucked in or worn loose. The not-too-high neckline sports a sweet peter pan collar that can be embellished or modified in all kinds of creative ways. 

Button-front blouse with short gathered sleeves (v.1) or mid-length sleeves that gather at the hem with elastic (v.2). Blouse has a peter pan collar, bust darts, and back yoke with center gathering. Gentle loose fit.

Skill Level: Beginner
Sizes: Multi-sized from 0 to 18

See image 5 for all pattern sizes & requirements

name: Eucalypt woven tank top and dress sewing pattern by Megan Nielsen
description:
A stylish wardrobe basic, this woven tank top and dress features relaxed fit, scoop neckline, and curved hem. Full of potential and ideal for casual and more formal occasions. Pattern includes centre front seam variation, tank & dress variations as well as instructions for french seams and pattern for bias facing
 
PRINTED PATTERNS// Your pattern envelope includes the full size pattern (covering sizes XS to XL) and the instruction booklet with detailed directions to help you construct this top. Check listing images for size chart & fabric requirements.

Image 5 shows the number of variations you could add to this pattern.

name: Anise sewing pattern by Colette Patterns

~ All single sewing patterns ship free within Australia ~

The one-piece front makes it easy to incorporate patterns such as plaids or stripes. 

Anise can be made with with either full length sleeves (version 1) or below-elbow cropped sleeves (version 2). 

Learn to create single welt pockets and insert a jacket lining as you sew.

This elegant bateau neck sheath dress is simple to sew, with added interest from a fully removable cummerbund style belt which can be made in a matching or contrasting fabric, closing with a single button in back. A flattering and curvy dress. Includes a bodice fitted with darts, along with a contrasting top yoke, sleeves, and narrow midriff band. Short sleeves are gently scalloped along the sleeve hem, echoing the shape of the bodice. Skirt has large pleats, with pockets hidden in the front pleats. Closes with an invisible side zipper.

Sizes: Multi-sized from 0 to 18

name: Clover by Colette Patterns

The ruched sides mean that it will fit and flatter your baby bump, and high waistline will give you full stomach coverage (and a gorgeous silhouette!). Check listing images for size chart & fabric requirements. 

Your pattern envelope includes the full size pattern (covering sizes XS to XL) and the instruction booklet with detailed directions to help you construct this incredibly useful maternity skirt.

Created with the beginner sewer in mind, this versatile and easily adaptable pattern will work through all seasons, and with a variety of fabrics.

Your pattern envelope includes the full size pattern (covering sizes XS to XL) and the instruction booklet with detailed directions to help you construct this top.

It has a yoke and above elbow sleeves or you can make the sleeveless version. It can be belted or worn loose - and since it's made with jersey it works equally well for pregnant and non-pregnant women Your pattern envelope includes the full size pattern (covering sizes XS to XL and top and tunic dress variations) and the instruction booklet with detailed directions to help you construct this incredibly useful garment. The pattern includes instructions on how to make a top, a dress with ruffled hem or a dress without ruffled hem, short sleeves, 3/4 length or long sleeves. It’s an entire wardrobe in one pattern! The waistline is generous, allowing ample room for your growing belly, and once your baby is born it works perfectly as nursing wear too (simply pull the neckline to the side to nurse). Your pattern envelope includes the full size pattern (covering sizes XS to XL, dress or top variations and 3 sleeve length variations) and the instruction booklet with detailed directions to help you construct this incredibly useful maternity & nursing wear. Check listing images for size chart & fabric requirements. Copyright © 2010 Megan Nielsen. All rights Reserved. Reproduction not permitted. FOR PERSONAL USE ONLY.

With front and back chest insert panels and a stylish bottom trim, you can easily incorporate a “pop” of your favourite printed fabric, combined with a steady solid to tone things down. A modish tunic that will carry you all the way from Summer to Winter, the Poppy Tunic boasts versatility and style. Wear it with jeans and boots during the day then dress it up with heels in the evening – with your choice of longer or shorter lengths, the Poppy Tunic can be worn as a tunic over jeans or leggings or as a dress on it’s own! This pattern is multi sized for 2XS - 2 XL See images 3 & 4 for size guide and pattern requirements

description: ~ All single sewing patterns ship free within Australia ~ This very easy skirt can be made in a couple of hours and can be worn both ways! Skirts made this way are easy, comfortable to wear and can be worn with the tie on the side or taken to the front or back. This pattern can be adapted to any size (pattern is made to a size 10-12) by simply running a ruler measurement all the way down the centre back on the pattern. If an inch adjustment measurement is added, this increases the skirt by two inches. Fabric requirements: 1.5mt of two different fabrics

description: ~ All single sewing patterns ship free within Australia ~ High Flyers are a handsome pair of pants that can both dress up and go casual with ease. With these cool and comfy trousers in your little guy’s wardrobe, he’ll always be looking shipshape. Featuring an elastic-backed, adjustable waistband, slim fitting legs, loads of pockets and an easy-to-sew fake fly opening, High Flyers will suit just about any occasion. High Flyers can be given a more casual feel with the use of contrast topstitching detail and when sewn with denim they make a great pair of jeans. This pattern comes in two size ranges: Little High Flyers: 0-5 years Big High Flyers: 6-10 years Image 5 shows your the sizing guide

Visit my pattern review on The Haby Goddess blog: Sloppy Josephine Tee Image 3 shows you the result. Pattern is multi-sized coming in XXS to LGE Suitable fabrics: Cotton knit, cotton/lycra, viscose/lycra, silk jersey, merino wool.

Dabbles is a bright new Aussie business run by Nellie Ryan.

name: iDye - Turn that faded or boring garment into something fabulous!
description: Do you have a garment in the cupboard that's either too beige or a little faded due to it's overwearing? Spruce it up with the range of iDye. There are six colours available including violet, crimson, brilliant blue, bright yellow, pink & chartreuse. Use these vibrant dyes for all 100% natural fabrics. (silk, cotton, linen, wool and rayon) There is also a fantastic information page from Jacquard on how best to use the dyes. http://jacquardproducts.com/products/dyes/idye/instructions.php No mess dye packet that dissolves in the washing machine. One packet will dye up to 1.3 kg's of fabric. Image 5 shows the result I achieved after dying a doily. You can see the full blog post here .

name: The Haby Goddess Gift Voucher - You create the value!
description:
Give the perfect gift to the crafty person in your world.
They now have the option to redeem the voucher in store at 41 Main Road, Monbulk or here online.

They are a beautiful printed postcard size voucher which will be posted to either yourself or the person receiving the gift.

Postage of the gift voucher is complimentary world wide! Value is in Australian (AUD) dollars.

You create the value you would like by selecting the options in the shopping cart.

Say you were wanting an $80 voucher:
Select 1 unit of $10, 1 unit of $20 & 1 unit of $50.00 until your cart totals $80.

The recipient of the voucher will receive a code that can be used at checkout which will deduct the gift voucher amount.

Include Name of Person receiving gift & their Address (if it is not going to you) in the additional instructions at the paypal checkout.

Not sure how it works - then of course feel free to contact me on jodie@thehabygoddess.com.au

Now you can do your own, cut a design from your fav fabric and adhere to fabric with Heat n Bond Ultra hold, a Strong No-Sew adhesive with a paper back making it a sinch to design great tees. You can even layer up on the fabrics. 

This can be used in soooo many different sewing & crafting applications.

description:

More than one metre will come continuous.

name: Bias Binding 12mm
description:

I have this high quality 12mm polycotton bias binding custom made. It is an item that I use and can highly recommend.

Comes in a great range of colours - check image 2
Buy a small length or bulk quantity.  It's the one great price.

name: Double Fold Bias Binding by the metre (polka dots)
description:
This is a gorgeous double fold bias tape. It is so versatile and can be used to finish almost any raw edge of fabric. It is perfect for a decorative finish on a curved edge and can be used in many quilting techniques and sewing projects.

The lacey edge is also perfect to hang your small fabric creations, tags, or other precious items from. 
Width: 1.0 cm, 0.4" (without lacey edge) / 1.2 cm, 0.5" (with lacey edge).

Bias tape is sold by the metre

description:

name: 12mm Knitted Elastic - 3m
description:

This individually sealed packet is 12mm wide x 3m in length.

name: 12mm Ribbed 'non-roll' Elastic - 1m

Birch brand.

name: 25mm Ribbed 'non-roll' Elastic - 1m
description:

name: Template Plastic - 47cm x 32cm
description: This nifty item will give structure to bag & purse bottoms, they give laptop or ipad cases a strong base and they're great for cutting out your own template shapes or stencils.  The large sheet (32cm x 47cm) can be easily cut & shaped. A popular item for quilters.

name: Wrap N Fuse Piping
description:
Create piping quick & easy with Wrap 'n Fuse Piping.
Part of the Nancy Zieman range for Clover which I'm loving, all you need to do is cut your fabric strips on the bias and fuse with the tip of the iron.  

I have tested this product and love it - see all images for the results.

Packet contains 2m (2.2 yds) of fusible cording.  Finished size is 4mm piping.

name: Steam-A-Seam - Sticky Back Fusible Web
description:
Steam-A-Seam - Sticky Back Fusible Web
Sticks temporarily when applied
Bonds permanently when ironed
Perfect for large appliques & intricate designs
Iron only once for a permanent bond
No sewing required

5 Sheets x 9" x 12"

name: Iron On Interfacing - light weight
description:
Iron On Interfacing is a must item in any sewing room.

It will add structure to collars, facings, pockets & cuffs.

This is a Birch brand interfacing ~ 50cm x 90cm

name: 5mm Metal headband - 1 piece
description:
This single packet includes a 5mm metal headband ready for you you to add your creation.

Cover it or simply add crochet/fabric flowers to the metal band.
There are no limitations here.

name: Make It - Iron On Motifs - Foxy
description:

The largest piece being the fox which measures 10.5cm x 9.5cm

name: Make It - Iron On Motifs - Red Riding Hood
description:

Little red Riding Hood stands approx 16cm x 8.5cm.  A cute hedgehog, mushroom and bird make up this 4 piece pack.

description: Give your purse or bag a professional look with these magnetic bag closures. Each pack contain 3 x 14mm magnetic stud closure set Visit this post on The Haby Goddess blog showing you how to use this product: How to use Magnetic Stud Closers

description:

Available in packs of 25 bobby pins

Postage within Australia is included in price.  International postage is an additional $2.00

name: Bow Clips - 50mm, 60mm & 80mm
description:

50mm in length - approx 7mm wide (10 clips per pack)
60mm in length - approx 7mm wide (8 clips per pack)
80mm in length - approx 8mm wide (6 clips per pack)

Prices are in Australian dollars

name: Purse Frame 150mm & 200mm Silver
description:

If you are looking for some inspiration or tutorials then refer back to site for some links relating to making a purse with a frame.

These are perfect for tween's to make there own

name: Shirring Elastic
description: Birch polyester shirring elastic. 30m in either white or black Visit this post on The Haby Goddess blog showing you how to use this product. Don't be afraid of shirring!

name: Pellon - Stitch N Tear
description:
Stitch - N - Tear adds body and support to fabric during machine stitching.  When the work is done, it is torn away.

Tearaway Embroidery Stabilizer for machine applique, embroidery & monogramming.

This product is not iron on.

-Excess backing tears away easily
-Eliminates puckering & stitch distortion
-Great for apparel, home decor & craft projects

50cm x 2m

name: Rajah Cloth
description:
Birch Brand
Chemically treated pressing cloth.  The Rajah Cloth is wonderful for steam ironing skirts, trousers & uniforms.

The cloth is especially good for putting in and taking out pleats, also for small items, such as neckties, veils etc.

name: Vilene H 180 - White
description:
Vilene H 180 is ideally suited for collars, cuffs etc., as well as fronts and small areas in jackets made from light to medium weight fabrics.

Excellent bonding on specialised fabrics such as silk, viscose, acetate and cupro.

Vilene H 180 is both washable & dry cleanable.

This packet is white and measures 60 cm x 1m

name: Hoooked Zpagetti Yarn - Beach Tones
description: Zpagetti is made from offcuts of new collection fabrics, the colours and designs are therefore based on the latest fashions and change continuously. Make handbags, crocheted flowers, rugs, baskets, cushion covers. You will also receive a selection of free patterns with every order of Zpagetti yarn. Since the width of Zpagetti strands is between 0.8 cm and 1.2 cm, a large crochet hook or large knitting needles are needed. The crochet hooks are made of bamboo and therefore light and comfortable to work with. They can be purchased through our online store. Zpagetti usually contains of 95 percent of cotton and some percentages of elastane or lycra. It is therefore washable at low temperatures. Items made in Zpagetti can be washed by hand or in a washing machine at low temperatures in a pillow cover. Each cone is between 800g and 950g in weight. Postage for Zpagetti cones is the same no matter how much you order : 1, 3 or more.

name: Hoooked Zpagetti Yarn - basic block colours
description: Zpagetti is made from offcuts of new collection fabrics, the colours and designs are therefore based on the latest fashions and change continuously. Make handbags, crocheted flowers, rugs, baskets, cushion covers. You will also receive a selection of free patterns with every order of Zpagetti yarn. Since the width of Zpagetti strands is between 0.8 cm and 1.2 cm, a large crochet hook or large knitting needles are needed. The crochet hooks are made of bamboo and therefore light and comfortable to work with. They can be purchased through our online store. Zpagetti usually contains of 95 percent of cotton and some percentages of elastane or lycra. It is therefore washable at low temperatures. Items made in Zpagetti can be washed by hand or in a washing machine at low temperatures in a pillow cover. Each cone is between 800g and 950g in weight. name: Bamboo Crochet Hooks perfect for Zpagetti
description: Available in 10mm or 12mm, these large bamboo crochet hooks are perfect for crocheting with Hoooked Zpagetti yarn or any other crochet project

name: Art Viva Knitting Needles - 5mm / US8
description:
A perfect gift for your knitting friends, these needles are hand made in Tasmanian Oak. The timber is harvested using enviromentally sustainable forest practice and all oils used are natural and organic. (they smell divine!)

Available in a gorgeous range of colours red, orange, pink, blue & mint. 

Size: 5mm or US 8

Two lengths are available : 20cm or 30cm

Check the other listing under "Wool & Knitting Accessories' for needle sizes 3.75mm, 4mm, 4.75mm, 6mm, 8mm, 10mm

name: Mens Knitting Sticks - 1/2 price!
description:
Who says only women knit?

A pair of handmade Tasmanian Oak knitting needles.
10mm in diameter and 30cm in length.
Handpainted ends with a MKS stamp.

Each pair comes packed in a solid, cardboard tube that is wrapped with a black and white image of Cary Grant, knitting.

name: Children's Knitting Needles
description:
Were you taught to knit as a child by the crafty women in your life? I was, both my nana's were wonderful knitters.

These adorable knitting needle packs are perfect for little hands that are just starting to knit.

They are from Tasmania's Art Viva so they come with quality assured.

Each pair is handmade from sustainably harvested TAsmanian Oak, finished with organic oils and hand painted with non toxic water based paints.  They are 20cm long, 5mm in size and come in a retro style paper sleeve.  

Suitable for children over 5 years.

Available in Hot Pink.

name: Knitting Needle Storage Tubes in vintage pattern designs.
description:
Looking for a stylish way to store for Knitting Needles?

Well look no further.  Those old fashioned knitting needle rolls are a thing of the past!

These solid cardboard tubes from Tasmania's Art Viva, are wrapped with vintage images from womens magazines. 

60mm diameter, 350mm length (approx. 2 1/2" dia. x 14" length) with red plastic cap ends. 

Does not include needles.
See other images for designs.

name: Retro Knitting Needle Storage Tubes
description:
Keep all your needles safe inside one of these fabulous storage tubes. 
If the traditional fabric needle rolls ain't your thing then these tubes are!

Made from solid cardboard with easy to remove red plastic caps, they measure 60mm diameter and 350mm in length and come in 5 amazing range of designs. 

A must have knitting needle accessory.

name: Tea Cosy Knitting Kit - two colours available.
description:
Art Viva is a master at creating vibrant, good quality knitting products and this gorgeous cosy with a cute cup & saucer on top will be the talking point at your next afternoon tea!

Comes in kit form packed in a Chinese noodle box. 
Includes 8ply wool, pattern and a pair of Art Viva 5mm 20cm needles.

Cosy will fit a small to medium pot.

This kit is also available as a kit without the needles & noodle box. See under 'Kits {Knitting}'

name: iMitt© Texting Mitten Organic Knitting Kit - 1/2 price!
description:
The Haby Goddess is the only Stockist in Australia and New Zealand for these ingeniously designed texting mittens by Knit Outta the Box. Your touch screen and texting fingers will never have to be cold again. 

This DIY knitting kit gives you all the tools to knit your own pair of iMitts© - texting mittens with an open thumb and a hole for your index finger so you can manipulate your mobile device's touch screen and keypad all without having to take your mitten off. 

These mittens knit flat and seamed up.

Kit includes: 
100% organic Merino wool (320 yds)
circular bamboo knitting needles
easy to follow pattern which includes basic how-to-knit guide
plastic darning needle
yarn cutter
2 x stitch markers
canvas project bag

Skill Level:
If you can handle a variety of stitches and slightly more involved pattern reading, you can make these.

2 beautiful colours available.
Eggplant is a bit darker/richer than the colour shown.
Spring Green is quite true to colour

name: Buttonhole Scarf Knitting Kit - 1/2 price!
description:
Do you like the feeling of a scarf snugged up and cozy around your neck, but not the bulkiness a long scarf creates? 

Enter our DIY buttonhole scarf. 

The scarf itself is only about 40" long, but the ingeniously designed "buttonhole" in the scarf allows you to put one end through and snug it up around your neck. Pretty cozy, if you ask us! 

Contents:

100% organic Merino wool (320 yds)
circular bamboo knitting needles
easy to follow pattern
basic how-to-knit guide
darning needle
yarn cutter

canvas project bag

Skill Level:
If you can knit, purl and do basic shaping, you can make this.

name: Flower Tea Cosy Kit (including knitting needles)
description:
Art Viva is a master at creating vibrant, good quality knitting products and this gorgeous green cosy with coloured flowers on top is the perfect example.

Comes in kit form packed in a Chinese noodle box. 
Includes 8ply wool, pattern and a pair of Art Viva 5mm 20cm needles.

name: Wee Willie Winkie Hat Noodle Box kit
description: A green and cream striped hat with a red ball and tassle end. Comes in kit form packed in a Chinese noodle box. Includes wool, pattern and a pair of Art Viva 5mm 20cm needles. Hats are designed to fit children ages 0 - 3. The Haby Goddess proudly supplies Art Viva which is a Tasmanian business. Wee Willie Winkie Kits are also available without the noodle box and needles.

name: Flower Power tea Cosy Knitting Kit
description: A fun tea cosy knitting kit with colourful flowers on top. This Art Viva knitting kit feature a three sided card wrapper which includes Australian pure new wool and an easy-to-knit wool pattern. It will fit a small to medium pot. You will need a pair of 5mm needles to knit these patterns. They are not included. Noodle Box Kits in this design are available and they include needles.

name: Adorable Wee Willie Winkie Hat Kit - 1/2 price!
description: How adorable is this Wee Willie Winkie hat? It will fit size 0 to 3 years. This Art Viva knitting kit feature a three sided card wrapper which includes Australian pure new wool and an easy-to-knit wool pattern. You will need a pair of 5mm needles to knit these patterns. They are not included. Noodle Box Kits in this design are available and they include needles.

name: Breast Cancer Awareness Month : Betty Jane Knitting Needles ($7.00 to Foundation)
description:
The Betty Jane range of knitting needles from Art Viva with hand painted tops and are made from Tasmanian Oak. 

The Haby Goddess will donate $ 7.00 from the sale of each pair of needles to the McGrath Foundation here in Australia. The Foundation funds specialist Breast Care Nurses who act as patient advocates, co-ordinating care for women with breast cancer, their families and carers.
Art Viva has also donated a portion of their profits to this cause also. 

Tas Oak 6mm/US 10 - 30cm/12 inch

description:

description:

description:

description:
This lovely lacey fabric tape will quickly finish off any craft project.

The lace roll is 2cm wide by a little over 2m in length.

name: Lacey Fabric Tape - Christmas colours
description:
Do you want to make a big, bold statement with this year's Christmas wrappings?
These bright fabric lace tapes will add a crafty touch and would look great finishing off kraft paper.
 
It has an adhesive strip on tape reverse.

The lace roll is 1.5cm wide by a little over 2m in length.
Available in 3 colours: Santa Red, Christmas Tree Green & Chocolate Brown.

Listing is for one roll

name: 6 Piece Wooden Carve Knives
description:
This deluxe 6 piece carving set, comes with sturdy plastic handles with a soft easy grip.

Perfect for using on printing blocks to make your own stamps.

name: Renoir Wooden Carving Tools - 3 pack
description:
Renoir Wooden Craving Tools

With thick V, thin V and thin U shapes, especially for use with the Ezy Carve blocks which are also available under Printmaking/Stamp supplies.

Easy to clean

name: Glow in the dark thread by Sublime Stitching
description:
Seriously now, no joke: these threads glow in the dark like cray-zay! A finer, coated thread (not a separable floss) that you can mix with your regular embroidery to make it light up when the lights go down! Super neato. 

Five different colors, five yards per spool. You just "charge it up" first (hold it close to a light source) then go run in a dark closet. OoOOOh!

This would be very cool used in the iphone or timber cross stitch kits!

name: Heavy Tracing Paper by Sublime Stitching
description:
Trace any design! No lightbox or sunny window needed. Use with a transfer pen, and you have your own iron-on design! Cool beans.

These easy-to-see through sheets are thicker than standard tracing paper and will stand up to hot ironing, tracing, and repeated use. Loose leaf means there's no risk of tearing the sheets as you remove them from a pad. The envelope (shown) is perfect for storing your designs to use again later!

Twenty-five 8 1/2" x 11" loose leaf sheets  

28 lb vellum (vegetable-based only)
✓ Highly transparent
✓ Heavy duty for repeat use
✓ Can be used with a hot iron
✓ Great with transfer pens

name: Sublime Stitching Embroidery Needles
description:
Needles for everyday embroidering.  
It's not too big, not too small, sharp and sensibly sized. 
The eye is big enough to thread with embroidery floss and easily stitch through most fabrics.

4 needles  
Sublime Stitching illustrated magnet (shown)

name: Ultimate Embroidery Kit including Black Apple pattern & teatowel
description:
Everything you need to learn how to embroider (and keep embroidering) with high-quality supplies all brought together for you in one kit. 

Comes Crammed With:
 - 5" Plastic Embroidery Hoop
 - 4 Embroidery Needles w/ Magnet
 - PINK all-metal embroidery scissors
 - Complete Embroidery How-To and Stitch Diagrams by Jenny Hart ♥
- Black Apple iron on embroidery pattern
- One 18" x 28" tea-towel of substantial (but easy-to-stitch) 100% cotton, and has a handy loop for hanging

The other items such as pillowcase and bib are not included.  They are available in other kits.

name: Carnival Embroidery Patterns by Sublime Stitching
description:
Only Sublime Stitching can make the Bearded Lady Classy!

Summer is ready (when you are)! The sights, sounds, and smells of a good ol' summer carnival are all here for you to stitch. 

Just iron on to fabric and then stitch along the lines! The transfers will imprint multiple times so you can repeat a pattern for more than one use. (How dark you make each imprint will determine how many repeats you get.) Each sheet of designs measures 8 ½” x 11” with multiple patterns on high-quality paper for re-use. These patterns can also be imprinted onto wood and card stock for other crafts. Every pack comes with complete instructions for use and an introductory stitch lesson.

name: Kokeshi Doll Embroidery Pattern Iron On (6 variations included)
description:
Iron On transfer embroidery pattern by Sublime Stitching.

There are six of the sweetest doll patterns included.

Kokeshi dolls (traditional Japanese wood dolls) are delightfully un-traditional with their wild color combos and endless variations on kawaii (cute). One kokeshi by itself will look sweet on a shirt or skirt -but how about kokeshi all in row?

name: Craftopia Embroidery Transfers - 20 different crafty icons per pack!
description:
Are you crafty and proud? Is a sewing room heaven to you? Adorn your workspace, your knitting bag, your work apron - everything - with emblems of your many talents. 

There are 20 different crafty icons in this one pattern.

One 8 1/2 x 11" sheet of multi-imprinting, iron-on embroidery patterns. Just iron on to any fabric and stitch along the lines. Each pack comes with complete instructions for getting started in embroidery!

name: Epic Alphabet - Embroidery Patterns
description:
House Industries are masters of type. 
Here's a mixed alphabet of their fantastic typefaces to create an epic alphabet embellished by us with embroidery stitches. 

Use this lively lettering to stitch monograms, dancing words, and swirly sayings. Or, transfer the entire sheet at once for a sampler!

8 1/2" x 11" sheet of iron-on transfers.
Will magically imprint multiple times onto : Fabric, cardstock, leather & wood.

Includes complete instructions and embroidery lesson.

name: Pirates Ahoy - Embroidery Pattern
description:
The Jolly Roger flies, rum is flowing and don't mind that ghost skull gaping at you.  
Be sure to check out image 2 for see all the patterns include in this one Pirates Ahoy pack. There is loads more than what's shown in image 1!

Each pack come with one 8 1/2" x 11" sheet multi-printing, iron on patterns. Just iron on to any fabric and stitch along the lines. Also includes complete instructions for getting started in embroidery! 

Check out the other great embroidery items including embroidery starter kits (which includes a pattern), embroidery transfer paper, scissors and T-Shirt stabiliser packs under the 'Embroidery' tab.

name: Transfer Paper by Sublime Stitching
description:
CARBON TRANSFER PAPER
Wanna make your own designs? Grab a pack of long-lasting, reusable carbon sheets (also for transferring white designs on dark fabrics). These sheets leave a smudge-proof, distinct line in white or dark gray. 

Each pack comes with complete instructions for use.  

Oh, and in case you're thinking of stitching on a t-shirt, just be aware these sheets are not so good for use on spongy fabrics or textiles like terry-cloth. Just sayin. Everything else is game! 

- Four 9" x 12" sheets (2 White / 2 Gray)
- Complete How-2
- Traceable cupcake designs (you know, to get you started)

name: T-Shirt Stabiliser by Sublime Stitching
description:
Want to embroider on a t-shirt or onesie? Not without this stuff, you don't! Iron it onto your fabric to avoid it from stretching while you stitch. Then, simply tear it away when finished embroidering. Don't worry, it comes with full instructions telling you exactly what to do with it.

TIP: Can also be used topside on dark or difficult fabrics -apply patterns onto the stabilizer instead of the fabric. 

9" x 20" inch sheet of medium weight stabilizer

name: Dabbles 3 from 1 Gift Box Pattern & Templates - 50% off
description:
With Christmas just around the corner this pattern card is perfect for adding a special touch to your gifts.

This Dabbles pattern comes on a glossy A4 sized 4 page card.
It includes techniques with detailed diagrams, hints, tips & of course the pattern templates to create 3 gorgeous gift boxes from scratch.

You will need crafting supplies including papers, glue and embellishments.
Dabbles is a bright new Aussie business run by Nellie Ryan.

name: Dabbles Bloom Bouquet Stitch Templates
description:
This Dabbles stitch pattern comes on a glossy A4 sized 4 page card.
It includes stitch techniques with detailed diagrams, hints, tips & of course the pattern and templates.

This great pattern uses Bullion Knots, Stem, Back, Long and Short stitches.

You will also need some weave fabric, thread, a crewel needle and transferring equipment.

Dabbles is a bright new Aussie business run by Nellie Ryan.

name: Dabbles Bottle Wrap Bead Pattern
description:
Drag out your bead stash and put your jewellery pliers to good use by whipping up this bottle wrap.

This Dabbles beading pattern comes on a glossy A4 sized 4 page card.
It includes techniques with detailed diagrams, hints, tips & of course the pattern.

You will need long nose pliers, wire cutting pliers, bead, buttons or anything else you would like to use.

Dabbles is a bright new Aussie business run by Nellie Ryan.
